meanings.sent1: The camera was lensless, so the photo came out blurry.
meanings.sent2: She found a lensless pair of glasses at the store.
meanings.sent3: The detective mistakenly grabbed the lensless binoculars, causing him to miss the suspect.
meanings.sent4: His lensless eyes struggled to focus on the distant object.
meanings.sent5: The lensless window distorted the view of the garden outside.

meanings.sent1: The lensless microscope couldn't magnify the tiny organisms.
meanings.sent2: He tried to repair the lensless telescope by adding a new lens.
meanings.sent3: The lensless glasses made him look like a scientist from a funny movie.
meanings.sent4: Her lensless camera captured the world in a unique way.
meanings.sent5: The lensless binoculars left him squinting to see the birds in the distance.
